plonetheme.tidyblog Package Readme
==================================

--------------
Tidyblog theme
--------------

This is a visual theme for Plone 3. It's based on the following skin:

"Tidy Blog" (http://www.oswd.org/design/information/id/3505) by Aaron Ganschow

This theme was initially generated with the plone3_theme recipe from ZopeSkeland using paster.

We tested it with IE 6 and IE 7, Firefox 2 and Safari.

Screenshot at "http://d9t.de/os/plone-plonetheme.tidyblog/tidyblog.png"
